attributes.action: teach the underestimated religion of satanism in schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are over 10,000 commited satanists that appeared at the meeting in London and we know there are many hundreds of more nationwide and we as British Citizens should deserve the right to know more about our religion.We want satanism taught in schools to show people it is not 'evil' or is not about sacrifice!!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
